meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Megan Soto Rich Betz Amanda Berofsky Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7438.

td.p: Megan Soto, a student services supervisor from San Diego, California
Rich Betz, a teacher from Honesdale, Pennsylvania
Amanda Berofsky, a quality assurance analyst from Waterford, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,999)

tr.td: HISTORIC OBJECTS
GERMANY'S NEXT TOP MODEL
TV THEMES
DUMB DOWN THE SAYING
DON "E"
(Alex: ach correct response will begin with the letter "E", and it'll be a piece of apparel--something you would don, something you would wear.)
MARIE

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the Bastille

Amanda
')

Rich
Megan
